{\footnotesize\ttfamily void gft\+::\+Set\+::\+Merge (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{\mbox{\hyperlink{structgft_1_1Set_1_1sSet}{s\+Set}} $\ast$$\ast$}]{S,  }\item[{\mbox{\hyperlink{structgft_1_1Set_1_1sSet}{s\+Set}} $\ast$$\ast$}]{T }\end{DoxyParamCaption})}



Merge two sets. 

The next field of the last element of set S points to the first element of set T. T does not change. \mbox{\Hypertarget{namespacegft_1_1Set_a32408e19a9bfd561195b0b1d920b6904}\label{namespacegft_1_1Set_a32408e19a9bfd561195b0b1d920b6904}}
